newsitem.title: USA: Columbus Energy sets 5-for-4 stock split.
newsitem.headline: Columbus Energy sets 5-for-4 stock split.

text.p: Columbus Energy Corp said Thursday that it has declared a five-for-four stock split, payable June 16 to shareholders of record May 27.

The company said the split would be "more appropriate" than a resumption of its policy of paying a ten percent stock dividend out of reacquired treasury shares, which was interrupted in the spring of 1996.
It added that cash will be paid in lieu of issuing fractional shares.
The company said the split would increase the number of outstanding shares to 3,875,000, from 3,100,000.
Columbus is involved in the exploratiuon, development and production of crude oil and natural gas.
Its stock was trading at 9-3/4 Thursday afternoon.
